short_description: fastpath function that performs transformations on the InputTable depending on the parameters in the FitTable.
long_description: fastpath function that performs transformations on the InputTable depending on the parameters in the FitTable.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: The relation that contains input data.
input_tables.description: The relation that contains input data.

argument_clauses.name: IDColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table numeric columns to exactly copy to the output. By default, all numeric columns will be converted to FLOAT.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table numeric columns to exactly copy to the output. By default, all numeric columns will be converted to FLOAT.
